segment.source: How to Modify the Scratch Directory Location
segment.target: How to Modify the Scratch Directory Location

segment.source: How to Modify the Scratch Directory Location
segment.target: How to Modify the Scratch Directory Location

segment.source: How to Modify the Scratch Directory Location
segment.target: How to Modify the Scratch Directory Location

segment.source: The scratch directory is used by the App-V Sequencer to save temporary files during the sequencing of an application.
segment.target: The scratch directory is used by the App-V Sequencer to save temporary files during the sequencing of an application.

segment.source: The specified scratch directory location should be located on the computer running the App-V Sequencer.
segment.target: The specified scratch directory location should be located on the computer running the App-V Sequencer.

segment.source: Use the following procedure to modify the scratch directory location.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to modify the scratch directory location.

segment.source: To modify the scratch directory location
segment.target: To modify the scratch directory location

segment.source: To open the App-V Sequencer Console, on the computer running the App-V Sequencer, select StartProgramsMicrosoft Application VirtualizationMicrosoft Application Virtualization Sequencer.
segment.target: To open the App-V Sequencer Console, on the computer running the App-V Sequencer, select StartProgramsMicrosoft Application VirtualizationMicrosoft Application Virtualization Sequencer.

segment.source: To access the App-V Sequencer Options dialog box, select ToolsOptions.
segment.target: To access the App-V Sequencer Options dialog box, select ToolsOptions.

segment.source: On the General tab, specify the new scratch directory location where you want the App-V Sequencer temporary files to be saved.
segment.target: On the General tab, specify the new scratch directory location where you want the App-V Sequencer temporary files to be saved.

segment.source: Alternatively, you can click Browse and use the Browse For Folder dialog box to specify a new location.
segment.target: Alternatively, you can click Browse and use the Browse For Folder dialog box to specify a new location.

segment.source: To save the new location and close the Options dialog box, click OK.
segment.target: To save the new location and close the Options dialog box, click OK.

segment.source: How to Create the Sequencer Package Root Directory
segment.target: How to Create the Sequencer Package Root Directory
